title: Patch 5.23
body: So I was about to go into a bot game and I crashed out when it came up to the loading period between champ select and in game. I thought nothing of it and logged out to log back in again but when I pressed launch it started redownloading the actual client itself aswell as the patch update. Help?

replies.body:
Hey QueenKawaii,

Some files may have been corrupted. Are you having issues patching your client?
